news.title: Juicy Swapper
news.body:
Welcome, with update 2.2 you now can
create your own account for
Juicy Swapper! Why create an account?
A Juicy account provides more options
then a guest would have!

patchnotes.body:
[#] Fixed Sparkle Specialist
[#] Fixed Recon Expert
[#] Fixed Dazzle
[#] Fixed Renegade Raider
[#] Fixed Fate
[#] Fixed Survival Specialist
[#] New Juicy accounts
[#] ui changes
